meanings.definition: The quality of being courageous or determined.
meanings.sent1: Her pluckinesses shone through when she stood up to the bully at school.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter's pluckinesses were evident as he ran into the burning building to save the family.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, her pluckinesses made her a formidable opponent in the wrestling match.
meanings.sent4: The pluckinesses of the underdog team led them to victory against the reigning champions.
meanings.sent5: His pluckinesses in the face of danger inspired others to be brave as well.

meanings.definition: The act of showing bravery or spirit.
meanings.sent1: The pluckinesses displayed by the soldier in battle earned him a medal of honor.
meanings.sent2: Cheering on her teammates with pluckinesses, she motivated them to give their best effort.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's pluckinesses in chasing after the big dog was both brave and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her pluckinesses on the dance floor were like a burst of energy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The pluckinesses of the young artist to pursue her dreams despite criticism was admirable.

meanings.definition: The state of having a bold or fearless attitude.
meanings.sent1: His pluckinesses in trying new things always led to exciting adventures.
meanings.sent2: The explorer's pluckinesses in the face of danger made him a legend in the history books.
meanings.sent3: The pluckinesses of the squirrel trying to steal nuts from the bird feeder was both daring and funny.
meanings.sent4: Her pluckinesses in speaking up for what she believed in inspired others to do the same.
meanings.sent5: The pluckinesses of the young detective to solve the case impressed even the seasoned officers.
